|brand = Ctera |model = CT-C200 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v2 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 01/09/2024 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Ctera_C200-2 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = NAS |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = AQR00C-1.6MM |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F6707;88F6707-A1;ARMADA 370; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM v7 |cpu1_type_rev = (PJ4 core) |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- 800 MHz / 1.0 / 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = ESMT;F59L2G81A-25T; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3L |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC512M8DN-DI; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1318; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = IEEE 802.3/3u/3ab |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:25:25
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2011.12;Marvell version: v2011.12 2013_Q1.0p2; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = SATA II, USB 3.0 |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_sata_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|jtag = yes,, 20-pin header,, unpopulated,, J2 |serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, J3
|flags = RTC w/ battery, buzzer, fan |addchip = Precision Timer;TI;NE555;;1;,,, 2-Wire RTC IC;Seiko;S35390A;;1;,,, Hardware Monitoring IC;Novoton;NCT7802Y;;1;,,, USB 3.0 Host Controller;Renasas;uPD720202;;1;,,, Field Programmable DSP Switcher;Marvell;88PG847B;;1;,,, 1A Low Dropout Voltage Regulator;GlobalTech;GS1117AX;;1;,,, 3A Synchronous Step-Down Switcher w/ Integrated FET;TI;TPS54327;;3; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = SerComm |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00OJMPNY8 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "AQR00C-1.6MM" is silk-screened on the main board.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6707 @1.0GHz :''ARMADA 370'' (''PJ4'' Core) ARM v7 *Storage: 256MB (NAND) Flash, 2x SATA II *Memory: 1GB (DDR3L) SDRAM *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 2x USB 3.0 ports ([[Renesas]] uPD720202) *Power: 12V/5A via barrel <!-- :mvebu: cortexa9: Add support for Ctera C200-V2 *2-Bay NAS - maximum two 3.5" HardDisks :;Hardware: :- SoC: Marvell 88F6707-A1 ARMv7 @1.2GHz (ARMADA 370) :- RAM: 1GB (2x Nanya NT5CC512M8DN-D1) :- Flash: 256MB NAND (ESMT F59L2G81A-25T) :- LAN: 1x GbE (Marvell 88E1318-NNB2) :- Storage: 2x SATA HDD 3.5" Slot :- USB: 2x USB 3.0 ports (Renesas uPD720202) :- Console: Internal J3 connector (1: Vcc, 2: Rx, 3: Tx, 4: GND) :- LEDs: 13x GPIO controlled :- Buttons: 2x GPIO controlled -->
==Links of Interest== *[https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/ctera/ctera_c200_v2 ''Ctera C200 v2'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] :{{WPLink|CTERA_Networks}} <!-- *Ctera C200 V1 is kirkwood-based 2-Bay NAS. :;Hardware: :SoC: Marvell 88F6281-A1 ARMv5TE @1.2GHz :RAM: 512MB (4x Nanya NT5TU128M8GE-AC) :Flash: 256MB NAND (Samsung K9F2G08U0C) :LAN: 1x GBE (Marvell 88E1116R-NNC1) :Storage: 2x SATA HDD 3.5" Slot :USB: 2x USB 2.0 port :Console: Internal J3 connector :(1: Vcc, 2: Rx, 3: Tx, 4: GND) :LEDs: 13x GPIO controlled :Buttons: 2x GPIO controlled -->
